titles.title: A resolution to provide for related procedures concerning the article of impeachment against Donald John Trump, President of the United States.
A resolution to provide for related procedures concerning the article of impeachment against Donald John Trump, President of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 17. Record Vote Number: 9.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution establishes procedures concerning the article of impeachment against former President Donald John Trump, including specific issues to be briefed by the parties, deadlines for filing trial documents, and the date for consideration of the article.
